mapper.select: Select ec.id, ec.title, ec.price, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum, ec.cover AS cover, et.`name` AS teacherName, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne, es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo From edu_course ec Left Outer Join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id=et.id Left Outer Join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_parent_id=es1.id Left Outer Join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id=es2.id Where ec.id=#{courseId}
